languages.text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Every enemy that approaches the Patriarch within a range of 1 cells (or that starts round adjacent to the Patriarch) must make a Will saving throw or will receive big amount of Psychic Damage.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's melee range or starts their turn adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a Willpower resistance test or suffer a large amount of mental damage.

languages.text: Перемещаясь на расстояние {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} к Предку или начиная свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на соседней с ним клетке, противник совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает <u>(от 10 до 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Перемещаясь на расстояние {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} к Предку или начиная свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на соседней с ним клетке, противник совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает значительный {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g}.

Перемещаясь на расстояние {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} к Предку или начиная свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} на соседней с ним клетке, противник совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает значительный {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психический урон{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando un enemigo entra en el {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del progenitor o empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adyacente a él, el enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir <u>(de 10 a 25)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un enemigo entra en el {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del progenitor o empieza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} adyacente a él, el enemigo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir <u>(de 10 a 25)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}.

languages.text: 敵がサイアの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}に移動する、または自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}をサイアに隣接した状態で開始するたび、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、<u>10-25</u>{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵がサイアの{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}に移動する、または自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}をサイアに隣接した状態で開始するたび、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、大量の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: 每当敌人进入虫群族长{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内，或在虫群族长身边开始{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，该名敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会受到<u>10-25</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人进入虫群族长{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内，或在虫群族长身边开始{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，该名敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会受到<u>10-25</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Wenn sich ein Gegner in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf-Reichweite{/g} des Schöpfers bewegt oder seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} neben ihm beginnt, erleidet der Gegner im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} <u>(10 bis 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn sich ein Gegner in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf-Reichweite{/g} des Schöpfers bewegt oder seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} neben ihm beginnt, erleidet der Gegner im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} <u>(10 bis 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi se déplace à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de mêlée{/g} du Sire ou commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sur une case adjacente, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit <u>(de 10 à 25)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi se déplace à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de mêlée{/g} du Sire ou commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sur une case adjacente, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit <u>(de 10 à 25)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.

Chaque fois qu'un ennemi se déplace à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}portée de mêlée{/g} du Sire ou commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sur une case adjacente, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit <u>(de 10 à 25)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}.

languages.text: Bir düşman, Efendi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş menziline{/g} girdiğinde veya {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} onun bitişiğinde başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde <u>(10 ila 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves into the Sire's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} or starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} adjacent to him, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer <u>(from 10 to 25)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
